constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Details required by condition 9 (CO2 emissions and water usage) pursuant to planning application reference: 17/16971/FUL (Demolition of existing garage and erection of 1no two storey, two bedroom detached dwelling)
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and the condition, as noted above, can be discharged.

Reasonable efforts have been made to check that the plans submitted for the purposes of this planning application are consistent from one to the next, and that the development hereby approved can be implemented in accordance with all of the plans submitted. Should it transpire that this is not possible and that your plans are flawed, please be clear that it may be impossible to implement this permission, and that any development undertaken which relies on this permission may be unauthorised and subject to enforcement action.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Acceptable works to lightly reduce and maintain 2 large Oaks, hopefully causing them to fill out and broaden rather than continue their upward momentum. The works are likely to aid the tree health in the long term and offer no negative impact upon health or public amenity.Recommendation:Approve.
